sentences.en: As a girl, she used to haunt the local cinema.
sentences.cn: 她还是姑娘的时候常去当地的电影院.

sentences.en: As a girl, she used to haunt the local theater.
sentences.cn: 小时候, 她常去当地那家剧院看戏.

sentences.en: His ghost is said to haunt some of the rooms, banging a toy drum.
sentences.cn: 据说他的鬼魂经常敲着玩具鼓出没在其中的一些房间里。

sentences.en: If you don t help me, I ll haunt you after my death.
sentences.cn: 如果你不帮助我, 我死后变鬼来缠你.

sentences.en: People say ghosts haunt that old house.
sentences.cn: 据说那座老宅子有鬼魂出没.

sentences.en: The area was a haunt of criminals.
sentences.cn: 这个地区是罪犯经常出没的地方.

sentences.en: The Channel Islands are a favourite summer haunt for UK and French yachtsmen alike.
sentences.cn: 海峡群岛是英国和法国的帆船运动爱好者夏日最爱去的地方。

sentences.en: The college library is a favorite haunt.
sentences.cn: 大学图书馆是人们喜欢的地方.

sentences.en: The ghost has been laid and will not return to haunt you again.
sentences.cn: 那鬼魂已经驱除,不会再来缠着你了.

sentences.en: The place is the haunt of off-duty policemen.
sentences.cn: 这里是不当班的警察经常光顾的地方。

sentences.en: The pub is said to be haunted by the ghost of a former landlord.
sentences.cn: 据说这个酒吧里经常有一位前任房主的鬼魂出没。

sentences.en: The special haunt of the kittens was the old barn.
sentences.cn: 猫特别喜欢到那个旧仓库去.

sentences.en: The stigma of being a bankrupt is likely to haunt him for the rest of his life.
sentences.cn: 破产的耻辱可能会让他余生不得安宁。

sentences.en: The Wanglang Preserve in western Sichuan is the haunt of the giant panda.
sentences.cn: 川西的王朗自然保护区是大熊猫出没的地方.

sentences.en: They say ghosts haunt this house.
sentences.cn: 据说这所房子里常闹鬼.

sentences.en: This is one of the cafes I used to haunt.
sentences.cn: 这是我以前常去的一家咖啡馆.

words.tran_cn: 闹鬼的；反复出现的；受到困扰的
不易忘怀的，萦绕于心头的；给人以强烈感受的
常去；缠住；使担忧（haunt的过去式和过去分词）
常去；缠住某人；萦绕在…心中（haunt的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 〈方〉鬼或其它超自然物体，常去的地方
trans.tran_en: a place that someone likes to go to often
if the soul of a dead person haunts a place, it appears there often

trans.tran_cn: 时常萦绕心头，使困窘，常去，以鬼魂形式出现，时常出现在，弥漫
trans.tran_en: if the soul of a dead person haunts a place, it appears there often
